articles.description: The study also found that the transmission of the virus was the most on the third and fifth day, mirroring evidence that human cases are the most infectious in the early stages.
articles.content: Mice and hamsters are used in medical research as they have a biological makeup similar to humans, besides being low-cost and having the ability to reproduce swiftly. (AP Photo/Jill Bleed)Hamsters pr… [+2375 chars]
